effect.name: TAP Vibrato
effect.description:
TAP Vibrato (LADSPA 2148)
Modulates the pitch of its input signal with a low-frequency sinusoidal signal. It is useful for guitar and synth tracks, and it can also come handy if a strange effect is needed.
effect.author: http://www.ladspa.org

parameter.name: Frequency
parameter.comment: Determines how fast the pitch is modulated up-down

parameter.name: Depth
parameter.comment: Sets the amount of pitch modulation
